info.title: Authentication v1
info.description:
Bykea Open API to get Authentication token. 
  
 To begin using Bykea Open APIs you will first need to submit a request for account creation using the **[Sign Up Form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeJdTF03gIEnK_O_lKFf9G85rpG9lzxFZeUsgwpSUwBCga2fA/viewform?usp=sf_link)**. 

 Once your account is enabled for API utilization and you have received your X-BB-Client-Key, you will then use our Authentication API to generate x-bb-client-token.
  
**Host URL**: https://sandbox-raptor.bykea.net
   
 **API URL:** {{Host URL}}/v1/oauth/customer
 
 **Request Header:**  
 Content-Type: application/json   
 X-BB-Client-Key: Will be provided after the creation of the account.
  
  For more information click **[here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1LWo_pQMx5KnoMfQhTO0XFWeAE-Jyv_-I9HssiOlGer0/edit?usp=sharing)**.

parameters.name: X-BB-Client-Key
parameters.description: enter the client key that was emailed to you

requestBody.description:
The required parameters are:
 - number (The correct format is 923071234567)
